body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky,
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, 186.

Hon Geo Robertson
Mr Jno BM Clay
Col. Orlando Brown
Genl Leslie Combs
-- Alex Trotter
-- J. Swigert
Phil Swigert
You are requested to act as committee to determine the selection of Portrait of Mr. Clay pursuant to the Resolution of the General Assembly Approved Jany 11th 1865. --

Do the Portraits on
exhibition meet the object of the Resolution? Which of the two is the better? --
Your response to these questions is Respectfully solicited

Respectfully
Thos E Bramlette
Gov. of Ky
Mr. Stauntons in my opinion gives an expression almost if not quite impossible to be excelled on canvass. No comparision between the two paintings as to merit and resemblance
